title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Pittsburgh, PA, USA
description:
Pittsburgh, PA is participating in the Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 (http://gdcr.coderetreat.org/) 
This year, Code & Supply is organizing the coderetreat in Pittsburgh as part of the Code & Supply End of Year Bash (http://codeandsupply.co/bash2015). 
Please register through Code & Supply's Meetup Event (http://www.meetup.com/Pittsburgh-Code-Supply/events/226400251/). 
This year, the PittsburghÂ Carnegie Museum of Art is hosting the coderetreat, a truly unique venue.
